exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type R : relation A equivR : equivalence R x, y : A H : [y : A | R x y] = [y0 : A | R y y0] Unable to unify "equiv_class ?M1667 = equiv_class ?M1668" with "R x y".

In environment A : Type R : relation A H0 : forall x y : A, R x y -> equiv_class x = equiv_class y x, y : A H : [y : A | R x y] = [y0 : A | R y y0] equiv_refl : reflexive R equiv_trans : transitive R equiv_sym : symmetric R Unable to unify "[y : A | R x y] = [y0 : A | R y y0]" with "R x y".

original: intros x y H. unfold equiv_class in H. apply R_impl_equality_of_equiv_class. apply H.
